home.title: {{siteName}} — Front-End Developer & Creative Engineer
home.description: Beyond code, I build experiences. Explore a curated showcase of projects where performance meets polished design, and discover how we can build your next big idea together.

aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.description: I’m a front‑end developer passionate about building smooth, modern, and accessible web experiences. I focus on clean UI engineering, performance, and creating interfaces that feel intuitive and alive. I love working across the stack, learning new tools, and crafting products that people enjoy using.
